name: Save the village! (migelan)
description:
🎮 Controls:
Movement: W & A    Pause: Esc
Jump: Space 
Attack: left click / J

Thanks for playing! 

🐛 Known issues:

  1. The attack system is currently broken, I will patch it soon.
  2. For HTML5, Fail to join the game after pressing the "back to menu" button.

*The game is a demo at that moment, more features are coming.

You can also download the Windows version! 

I want to make a Mac version but I don't have a Mac now. :(  (Want a Mac mini or MacBook Air )

💻 Platforms:

  • Browser (HTML5)
  • Windows

Maybe add them later:

  • macOS
  • Android
  • Linux(Ubuntu)
